name: La Palabra
description: '''La Palabra''' (born '''Rodolfo M. Foster''' in  [[Caimanera, Cuba]]) is an American bandleader,  singer-songwriter,  pianist,  record producer, and  arranger, known for his versatile approach to music, particularly his invention of the [[Salsa romantica]] [[Latin music (genre)|Latin music]] genre and his signature style of [[Afro-Cuban]]-influenced, sensual [[Latin jazz]].
